<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">/// analyzeBranch - Analyze the branching code at the end of MBB, returning</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">/// true if it cannot be understood (e.g. it&#39;s a switch dispatch or isn&#39;t</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">/// implemented for a target).  Upon success, this returns false and returns</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">/// with the following information in various cases:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1 If this block ends with no branches (it just falls through to its succ)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">///    just return false, leaving TBB/FBB null.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2 If this block ends with only an unconditional branch, it sets TBB to be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">///    the destination block.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 3 If this block ends with an conditional branch and it falls through to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">///    an successor block, it sets TBB to be the branch destination block and a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="comment">///    list of operands that evaluate the condition. These</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="comment">///    operands can be passed to other TargetInstrInfo methods to create new</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">///    branches.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 4 If this block ends with an conditional branch and an unconditional</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">///    block, it returns the &#39;true&#39; destination in TBB, the &#39;false&#39; destination</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">///    in FBB, and a list of operands that evaluate the condition. These</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">///    operands can be passed to other TargetInstrInfo methods to create new</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">///    branches.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Note that removeBranch and insertBranch must be implemented to support</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">/// cases where this method returns success.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxinstrinfo/#ac741087fd882a50ae09491bdaebcaad9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxinstrinfo/#ac741087fd882a50ae09491bdaebcaad9">NVPTXInstrInfo::analyzeBranch</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a1441f79530bc7f3a89118bb8067eac69">TBB</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;&amp;FBB,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;MachineOperand&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AllowModify)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the block has no terminators, it just falls into the block after it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
